help.title: How to enable camera:
help.step1: Click the lock/camera icon next to the URL
help.step3: Reload the page and try again

original_text.The device doesn't support navigator.med: The device doesn't support navigator.mediaDevices , only supported cameraIdOrConfig in this case is deviceId parameter (string).
original_text.Camera streaming not supported by the br: Camera streaming not supported by the browser.
original_text.Unable to query supported devices, unkno: Unable to query supported devices, unknown error.
original_text.Camera access is only supported in secur: Camera access is only supported in secure context like https or localhost.
original_text.Or drop an image to scan: Or drop an image to scan
original_text.Or drop an image to scan (other files no: Or drop an image to scan (other files not supported)
